entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries near the Cariboo mountains this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
